name: next-big-nashville-artistband-submission-deadline-extended-nashvillest-psas
title: Next Big Nashville Artist/Band Submission Deadline Extended [Nashvillest PSAs]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Absentminded artists, fate has smiled upon you, as the gods of Next Big Nashville have extended the submission deadline, formerly today, to this Friday, July 17. This is your friendly reminder to get moving if you wish to be considered for the 2009 Next Big Nashville lineup.

This year’s Next Big Nashville will take place October 7-11, and the rapidly-growing festival will expand to include more daytime events, parties, interactivity and opportunities for the participating artists.
